languages.text: Each stack of {g|Encyclopedia:UnyieldingBeacon}unyielding beacon{/g} additionally increases {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} by +1%.
